dict.acceptation: 房屋；供给住宅；掩护；外罩；

sent.orig: Housing loans are divided into housing loans on own account, housing combined loans.
sent.trans: 个人住房贷款是指银行向借款人发放的用于购买住房的贷款。

sent.orig: Housing loans divided into housing loans on own account, housing loans on authorization and combined loans.
sent.trans: 个人住房贷款分为自营性住房贷款、委托住房贷款和组合贷款。

sent.orig: About Portuguese housing policy, housing situation, of housing law evolve, thank each prawn!
sent.trans: 关于葡萄牙的住房政策，住房状况，住房法律的演变，谢谢各位大虾了！

sent.orig: Urban residential differentiation; Mixed-income housing; Harmonious city; Affordable housing; Pleasant housing.
sent.trans: 城市空间分异；混合居住；和谐城市；可承受成本住宅；适宜性住宅。

sent.orig: Housing rental contracts: the rental housing area is?
sent.trans: 房屋租赁合同：这套出租房面积究竟是多少？
